Html: How can I change the direction of the generated graph from vertical to horizontal?

Use the following:

Graphviz: GraphvizGraph.RandDirection property (Left-to-right or Top-to-bottom)
Glee: Graph.GraphAttr.Orientation property

Thanks for your quick answer.
The RankDirection property isn´t included in the old QuickGraph version I used for my website (I downloaded the dlls from the codeproject website). Í´ve seen that you´ve posted new source code.
Can you tell a c# and visual studio newbie how to include the new source code into my website?

I´ve got the dll problem solved now.
